colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES SMAN GYI LHA MO'I GSANG SMRA'I MAN NGAG GI SGRUB THABS KYI ZHUNGS MDZAD PA BA SO RDO RJE 'CHANG MER GEN PAndI TA BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO SMAN PA BLO BZANG DON GRUB SKUR BRTEN PA CHOS KYI BLO BZANG NYI MA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PEHL BAR GYUR CIG ,)
